settings.heading: The New Way to Experience Audio
settings.details: NVY is the next generation of audio powered by experiences — brought to you by the team that helped shape the industry under DS18. We know what works, with decades of product knowledge and real-world insight, we’re reworking the standard!

settings.heading: We Built Something New
settings.details:
NVY is precision-engineered audio for all-terrains made to install smarter, and perform cleaner.

NVY-Grade systems spare no expense on the latest in audio technology to improve our components’ visual appeal and capabilities in their respective environments.

We amplify what matters: sound, energy, and movement.

settings.heading: Dual Focus Design
settings.details: At NVY, every product begins with a shared vision — where engineering precision meets intentional design. Our creative and technical teams work in lockstep for improved performance and presence. From material choices to mounting mechanics, every detail is refined to meet the highest standards — yours.

settings.heading: Jeep Audio
settings.details: Born from crowd favorites, and refined through experience — NVY Jeep components are sculpted for an OEM fit in Jeep Wrangler interiors.

settings.heading: Marine Audio
settings.details: Every marine audio component is part of a unified system designed for cleaner reproduction through all elements.

settings.heading: Motorcycle Audio
settings.details: High-performance audio built for riders who push limits.

settings.heading: Powersports Audio
settings.details: NVY powersports audio is built for all extremes, pushing performance where limits don't apply.
